languages.text: "Вы прошли через многое, почтенный магос — и все же калейдоскоп ваших цветов ярок и пестр. Подобно разбитому витражу..."
"You have been through a lot, esteemed Magos — and yet the kaleidoscope of your colours is bright and prismatic, like a shattered pane of stained glass..."
languages.original_text: "Вы прошли через многое, почтенный магос — и все же калейдоскоп ваших цветов ярок и пестр. Подобно разбитому витражу..."

traits.locale_text: "You have been through a lot, esteemed Magos — and yet the kaleidoscope of your colours is bright and prismatic, like a shattered pane of stained glass..."
"You have been through a lot, esteemed Magos — and yet the kaleidoscope of your colours is bright and prismatic, like a shattered pane of stained glass..."
"You have been through a lot, esteemed Magos — and yet the kaleidoscope of your colours is bright and prismatic, like a shattered pane of stained glass..."
"You have been through a lot, esteemed Magos — and yet the kaleidoscope of your colours is bright and prismatic, like a shattered pane of stained glass..."

languages.text: “你遭受了很多痛苦，尊敬的贤者，但你仍拥有着万花筒般明亮而绚丽的色彩，看起来就像一块破碎的彩色玻璃……”
languages.original_text: "You have been through a lot, esteemed Magos — and yet the kaleidoscope of your colours is bright and prismatic, like a shattered pane of stained glass..."

traits.locale_text: “你遭受了很多痛苦，尊敬的贤者，但你仍拥有着万花筒般明亮而绚丽的色彩，看起来就像一块破碎的彩色玻璃……”

languages.text: « Vous avez traversé bien des épreuves, honorable magos. Pourtant, le kaléidoscope de vos couleurs est toujours aussi lumineux et prismatique, comme un vitrail... »
languages.original_text: "You have been through a lot, esteemed Magos — and yet the kaleidoscope of your colours is bright and prismatic, like a shattered pane of stained glass..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez traversé bien des épreuves, honorable magos. Pourtant, le kaléidoscope de vos couleurs est toujours aussi lumineux et prismatique, comme un vitrail... »

languages.text: «Ha sufrido mucho, estimado Magos... pero el caleidoscopio de sus colores es brillante y prismático, como una vidriera rota...».
languages.original_text: "You have been through a lot, esteemed Magos — and yet the kaleidoscope of your colours is bright and prismatic, like a shattered pane of stained glass..."

traits.locale_text: «Ha sufrido mucho, estimado Magos... pero el caleidoscopio de sus colores es brillante y prismático, como una vidriera rota...».

languages.text: 「ずいぶん苦労されてきたのですね、偉大なマゴス…ですが、あなたの色の万華鏡は明るく色鮮やかで、色ガラスの窓を粉にしたかのよう…」
languages.original_text: "You have been through a lot, esteemed Magos — and yet the kaleidoscope of your colours is bright and prismatic, like a shattered pane of stained glass..."

traits.locale_text: 「ずいぶん苦労されてきたのですね、偉大なマゴス…ですが、あなたの色の万華鏡は明るく色鮮やかで、色ガラスの窓を粉にしたかのよう…」

languages.text: "Ihr habt viel durchgemacht, verehrter Magos — und doch strahlt das Kaleidoskop Eurer Farben bunt, hell und prismatisch, wie eine gesprungene Scheibe Buntglas ..."
languages.original_text: "You have been through a lot, esteemed Magos — and yet the kaleidoscope of your colours is bright and prismatic, like a shattered pane of stained glass..."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt viel durchgemacht, verehrter Magos — und doch strahlt das Kaleidoskop Eurer Farben bunt, hell und prismatisch, wie eine gesprungene Scheibe Buntglas ..."

languages.original_text: "You have been through a lot, esteemed Magos — and yet the kaleidoscope of your colours is bright and prismatic, like a shattered pane of stained glass..."

languages.text: "Çok şey görüp geçirdin değerli Magos. Gelgelelim senin renklerinin kaleydoskobu, parçalanmış bir vitrayın cam parçaları gibi parlak ve prizmatik."
languages.original_text: "You have been through a lot, esteemed Magos — and yet the kaleidoscope of your colours is bright and prismatic, like a shattered pane of stained glass..."

traits.locale_text: "Çok şey görüp geçirdin değerli Magos. Fakat renklerinin kaleydoskobu, parçalanmış bir vitrayın cam parçaları gibi parlak ve prizmatik."
